service.description: nsrexecd Deamon is part of the networker client and listens to remote requests - two ports are fix 7937/tcp and 7938/tcp and udp - two additioanl ports are required and opened dynamically. - snapshots require two additional ports see networker security guide. to set the port range to use by nsreced use the following command: nsrports -S 7937-7942
